title: PS5 Slim with all 4 cover colors! #ps5 #slim #sony #playstation #accessories #ign #spiderman

description:
If there’s one thing you shouldn’t miss out on before rolling credits on Dragon’s Dogma 2, it’s finding and completing the puzzles of the mysterious Sphinx. This is a secret best left to discover on your own, but if you’ve searched high and low and still haven’t found the mythical beast, or you’re stuck on solving one of its many riddles, in this video, we’ll show you exactly how to not only find the Sphinx, but how to solve every single riddle to get all of those juicy rewards.

00:00 Intro
00:28 Before You Begin
00:42 How to Find the Sphinx
02:10 Riddle of Eyes
02:25 Riddle of Madness
02:41 Riddle of Wisdom
03:42 Riddle of Conviction
03:45 Riddle of Rumination
04:32 Riddle of Reunion
05:32 Riddle of Recollection
06:05 Riddle of Differentiation
06:54 Riddle of Futility
07:32 Riddle of Contest
08:02 Final Reward

#IGN #Gaming #DragonsDogma2
title: Dragon’s Dogma 2: How to Solve All 10 Sphinx Riddles

description:
Matrix fans can look forward to a brand new Matrix movie coming from director Drew Goddard. Drew Goddard is helming the new film, who you might know as the man behind The Martian and The Cabin In The Woods. No Wachowski is in the driver’s seat of this one, instead Lana Wachowski will serve as executive producer. As to why Drew is helming the film, the WB’s Motion Pictures president said, “Drew came to Warner Bros. with a new idea that we all believe would be an incredible way to continue the #Matrix world, by both honoring what Lana and Lilly began over 25-years ago and offering a unique perspective based on his own love of the series and characters.” There’s no word on if #TheMatrix movie will feature the original cast of Keanu Reeves and company, but IGN will keep you posted. We also have news on Velma season 2, plus Joker Movie 2.

#IGN
title: First Matrix Film To Not Have A Wachowski Directing In The Works - IGN The Fix: Entertainment

description:
Watch this tense clip from The Ministry of Ungentlemanly Warfare, an upcoming movie starring Henry Cavill, Eiza González, Alan Ritchson, Alex Pettyfer, Hero Fiennes Tiffin, Babs Olusanmokun, Henrique Zaga, Til Schweiger, with Henry Golding, and Cary Elwes.

Based upon recently declassified files of the British War Department and inspired by true events, The Ministry of Ungentlemanly Warfare is an action-comedy that tells the story of the first-ever special forces organization formed during WWII by UK Prime Minister Winston Churchill and a small group of military officials including author Ian Fleming. The top-secret combat unit, composed of a motley crew of rogues and mavericks, goes on a daring mission against the Nazis using entirely unconventional and utterly “ungentlemanly” fighting techniques. Ultimately their audacious approach changed the course of the war and laid the foundation for the British SAS and modern Black Ops warfare.

The Ministry of Ungentlemanly Warfare opens in t
title: The Ministry of Ungentlemanly Warfare - Official 'Marjorie Meets Luhr' Clip (2024) Eiza González

description: Saber Interactive's CEO has confirmed that work is continuing on the Knights of the Old Republic remake, telling IGN that the game is in active development, and that they're aiming to "exceed consumer expectations." Concern for the project stems from a lack of any news of the game's progress and financial trouble with Saber's former parent company Embracer Group. KOTOR was previously in development at Aspyr, where it hung in development hell for years. In other news, hackers have reported an exploit to Sony that allowed the PlayStation Portal to run emulated PSP games. And finally, Dave the Diver is diving into PlayStation Plus on April 16.
title: KOTOR Remake is "Alive and Well," According to Developer - IGN Daily Fix
Bambi horror movie shows the hunter who shot Bambi’s mom. #bambi #thereckoning #movie #trailer

description:
Xbox recently began putting games like Hi-Fi Rush, Grounded, Pentiment, and Sea of Thieves on competing platforms. But with ballooning game development costs and layoffs becoming more and more common it's not just Xbox discussing how their exclusive strategy will change.

The most recent story was about how Xbox exclusives would be changing in the coming years, but PS5 exclusives have also changed. PlayStation PC games have become a much more common practice from Sony, and even Nintendo has expanded to new horizons with attractions like theme parks and movies planned.

#IGN #Gaming #Xbox
title: Xbox Isn't The Only One Rethinking Console Exclusives

description:
Check out the trailer for Cuckoo, an upcoming movie starring Hunter Schafer, Dan Stevens, and Jessica Henwick.

Reluctantly, 17-year-old Gretchen leaves her American home to live with her father, who has just moved into a resort in the German Alps with his new family. Arriving at their future residence, they are greeted by Mr. König, her father's boss, who takes an inexplicable interest in Gretchen's mute half-sister Alma. Something doesn't seem right in this tranquil vacation paradise. Gretchen is plagued by strange noises and bloody visions until she discovers a shocking secret that also concerns her own family. 

Cuckoo, written and directed by Tilman Singer, opens in US theaters on August 9, 2024.

#IGN
title: Cuckoo - Official Trailer (2024) Hunter Schafer

description:
In the award-winning Homeworld games for PC, you play as Fleet Command, a human commander who controls a fleet of spaceships. Players will take on the same role in Homeworld: Vast Reaches in vicious combat against a mysterious new foe. 

This new game in the Homeworld universe is launching on the Meta Quest 2 and Meta Quest 3 headsets later this year. Players can now wishlist the game at HomeworldVastReaches.com

#Gaming #VR #IGN
title: Homeworld: Vast Reaches - Official Announcement Trailer

description: Check out the new gameplay overview trailer for Gigantic: Rampage Edition, the definitive version of the popular 5v5 MOBA hero shooter. Get up to speed on gameplay features and mechanics and get an overview of the new Rush mode and the returning Clash mode. Gigantic: Rampage Edition will be released for PC, PlayStation, and Xbox platforms on April 9.
title: Gigantic: Rampage Edition - Gameplay Overview Trailer

description:
The Joker and Suicide Squad: Kill The Justice League Season 1 is here, but is it worth returning to Metropolis? The discussion on Beyond heats up, as Jada Griffin and Akeem Lawanson break down what gamers can expect to experience with the newest member of Task Force X: The Joker! This Elseworlds Joker is vastly different from the Arkham video games’ version of the Clown Prince of Crime, which has been a topic of online conversation. The Beyond crew explore the story, gameplay, and overall offerings you can jump into with Suicide Squad: Kill The Justice League season one.

#IGN
title: Is Suicide Squad: Kill The Justice League Season 1 Worth It?

description:
Here's a look at 15 minutes of Biomorph gameplay from the upcoming hand-drawn Metroidvania adventure game. The video showcases fights against various enemies, exploration, and more. In Biomorph, you don't just defeat enemies; you conquer and absorb their powers to evolve into a formidable force. Each creature you vanquish transforms you, granting new abilities for combat and exploration. Biomorph will be available Steam on April 5, 2024.

#Gaming #Biomorph #IGN
title: Biomorph - Official 15 Minutes of Gameplay

description:
Press START to continue! Check out this fun new X-Men '97 clip from Marvel Animation's all-new series to see some arcade action! 

Marvel Animation’s X-Men’97 revisits the iconic era of the 1990s as The X-Men, a band of mutants who use their uncanny gifts to protect a world that hates and fears them, are challenged like never before, forced to face a dangerous and unexpected new future. 

The all-new series features 10 episodes. The voice cast includes Ray Chase as Cyclops, Jennifer Hale as Jean Grey, Alison Sealy-Smith as Storm, Cal Dodd as Wolverine, JP Karliak as Morph, Lenore Zann as Rogue, George Buza as Beast, AJ LoCascio as Gambit, Holly Chou as Jubilee, Isaac Robinson-Smith as Bishop, Matthew Waterson as Magneto, and Adrian Hough as Nightcrawler. 

Beau DeMayo serves as head writer; episodes are directed by Jake Castorena, Chase Conley and Emi Yonemura, and the series is executive produced by Brad Winderbaum, Kevin Feige, Louis D’Esposito, Victoria Alonso and DeMayo. Featuring
title: X-Men '97 - Official Arcade Clip (2024) Holly Chou, Gui Agustini

description:
The Ascent is Isonzo: WW1 Italian Front's new limited-time gameplay event that starts on April 10, and it's based on actual historical fighting at high altitude from the first Great War. You'll battle on a literal cliffside – including throwing rocks at your opponents below to try and knock them off the mountain.

#IGN
title: Isonzo: WW1 Italian Front - Ascent: Official Trailer
Jump Ship is a mix of Sea of Thieves, Left 4 Dead, and FTL! #jumpship #videogame #coop #multiplayer

description:
